climbs.name: Sympathy for the Devil
climbs.fa: bolted by Mike Engle, Kira Engle, Vernon Phinney, & Chris Barnes, Sept 2018

content.description:
Climb up to an obvious arete and follow until you can join the final few bolts of Brown Sugar.

Start on a steep, slightly mossy ramp until you can cross the arete to a small stance.  Move up to a burly undercling and pull thin cranky moves and work the arete untill to can gain the flake on Brown Sugar.   Continue on the last few bolts of Brown Sugar.
content.protection: About 14 bolts, sport anchors.  Shares top anchors with Brown Sugar.
content.location: From the small saddle at the base of of the left side of Rolling Stone, move up a slightly to the right to the first bolt.

climbs.name: Start Me Up
climbs.fa: bolted by Mike Engle, Vernon Phinney, and Chris Barnes

content.description: Climb a thin, techy gray slab up and leftward until you can step left to a small stance below a 16" roof.  Pull the roof to a steep finish before you pull onto a small ledge and the anchors.
content.location: 10 feet right of the left facing corner of Beggar's Banquet.

climbs.name: Brown Sugar
climbs.fa: bolted by Chris Barnes & Vernon Phinney; Sept 2018

content.description: Climb up until you can gain a  left facing corner of a pointy flake.  From the tippy top of the flake, stem left across the gap and pull onto a very thin face.  Technical climbing on good holds and rock past a few bolts leads to flake and a stance.  Climb up to a horizontal crack and blast over a small roof to a *not obvious* clipping hold left of the anchors.
content.location: The slope of the base ends on a small but flat saddle on the left edge of the climb.  Pull onto the face a few feet before the saddle.

climbs.name: Beggar's Banquet
climbs.fa: bolted by  Mike Engle, Vernon Phinney, & Chris Barnes; Sept 2018

content.description: Climb up a left facing dihedral.  Step right below the overhang and join the last few 4 bolts of Start Me Up.
content.location: Follow the approach trail from Gateway Rock and arrive at the left side of Rolling Stone.  Look for an obvious left facing corner a few feet off the deck.

climbs.name: Satisfaction
climbs.fa: bolted by Vernon Phinney & Chris Barnes, Sept 2018

content.description: Face climb up to an obvious orange streak. Pass left over the streak and continue up to a steep bulge.  Crank through the bulge and continue to the anchors.
content.location: 10  feet right of Start Me Up.  Pull on some fun chert and continue up towards the obvious orange lichen streak.

climbs.name: Monkey Man
climbs.fa: bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, Dale Polen, & Mike Engle; Sept 2018

content.description: Begin on fun chert that gets thinner as you approach a huge 25 foot flake.  Stem/jam the right facing corner of the flake to small stance.  Climb a steep face up and left on small but decent holds. until you grab the edge of rail leading to the top.  Pull over the rail to easier ground and move up and right to the anchors.
